/circle6 Monitor the frequency and duration of the contractions every half an hour. Count the 
number of contractions occurring every 10 minutes and their duration in seconds, and 
also monitor the FHR every fi ve minutes. Be vigilant regarding the presence of any 
emergency signs, such as shock, diffi  culty in breathing, vaginal bleeding, convulsions 
and unconsciousness.
